tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (LS i) (NN FIND)) (NP (NP (NN happiness)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJS simplest)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NNS things))))))))
